page.title: 10WORKING MOTHERS-TEANASSIE
page.content: Most mothers work locally as they often have small children to look after and even if they don't have small children they probably wouldn't be able to work far away because many of the mothers can't drive.If the father worked far away and the mother worked in a different place then two cars would be needed and that would cost so much that it would not be worthwhile working. All the school children in Teanassie School travel to school by school transport as the distances are so great and the roads narrow and winding. Parents help by transporting pupils to swimming lessons,sporting events with other school and on visits to the theatre in Inverness.
